The Jonas mask is an untradeable event item rewarded after completing the 2017 Halloween event. If destroyed, you can obtain a replacement from Diango in Draynor Village.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 November 2017
(update)

The event version's "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The mask, and Jonas himself, are references to Jason Voorhees from the Friday the 13th series.
  • The letters from "Jonas" can be rearranged to form the name "Jason", another reference to Jason Voorhees.

==Trivia==
*The mask, and [[Jonas]] himself, are references to ''{{wp|Jason Voorhees}}'' from the ''{{wp|Friday the 13th (franchise)|Friday the 13th}}'' series.
*The letters from "Jonas" can be rearranged to form the name "Jason", another reference to Jason Voorhees.
